channel.title: Il Quadro Di Troisi on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Il Quadro Di Troisi on mattischrome

item.title: 2024 Albums of the Year #5: Il Quadro di Troisi, La Commedia
item.description: It’s interesting that an album sung entirely in Italian ended up being one of my favourites of the year, but perhaps not surprising given well written and arranged these songs are. They’re just the right side of electro-pop but also with an air of sophistication.
